title: Econometrics II
description: Linear and nonlinear regression analyses, hypothesis testing, ordinary and generalized least squares, instrumental variables estimation, the generalized method of moments, the method of maximum likelihood, methods for stationary time series, unit roots and cointegration, and specification testing.

prerequisites: ECON 7022 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
